snippet.title: Crab God - Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2289390/Crab_God/?utm_source=Youtube&utm_medium=&utm_campaign=Partnershipannouncement&utm_content=Teaser

Crab God is an atmospheric underwater strategy game where you nurture a quirky family of Crablings and breathe life into your underwater domain.

While caring for their reef, players will aid real-life conservation efforts via dots.eco. Working alongside various environmental charities, Crab God allows players to feel joy and accomplishment as they progress, converting in-game actions into tree planting, ocean cleaning, reef restoration, and more.

Crab God:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2289390/Crab_God/
Official website - https://firesquid.games/games/crab-god
Newsletter - https://bit.ly/CrabGodNews
Twitter -  https://twitter.com/crabgodgame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/crabgodgame/
Threads - https://www.threads.net/@crabgodgame
Discord - https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

Firesquid:
Official website - https://www.firesquid.fr
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/firesquid
Twitter -  https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames

Chaos Theory:
Official website - https://www.chaostheorygames.com/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/chaostheory_au

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Trailer Maker: Firesquid
